SEARCH
Package HMS.src.user

Class PatientManager

java.lang.Object
HMS.src.user.PatientManager
public class PatientManager extends Object
The PatientManager class provides functionalities for managing patient-related operations, including viewing and updating patient information, managing appointments, and accessing medical records.

  • Method Details

    • getPatientID

      private String getPatientID()
      Retrieves the current patient's ID from the session.
      Returns:
      The patient ID of the logged-in patient.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if no patient is logged in.

    • displayPatientInfo

      public void displayPatientInfo()
      Displays the patient's information, such as name, date of birth, gender, and contact details.

    • displayMedicalRecords

      public void displayMedicalRecords()
      Displays the medical records for the currently logged-in patient.

    • showPatientAndRecords

      public void showPatientAndRecords()
      Displays both the patient's information and their medical records.

    • updatePatientContactInfo

      public void updatePatientContactInfo()
      Allows the patient to update their contact information, including email, phone number, next of kin name, and next of kin phone number.

    • getDrNameByID

      public static String getDrNameByID(String doctorID)
      Gets the dr name by its ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the medicine
      Returns:
      The doctor name if found, null otherwise

    • viewAvailableSlots

      public void viewAvailableSlots()
      Displays available appointment slots for scheduling.

    • scheduleAppointment

      public void scheduleAppointment(String patientID)
      Allows the patient to schedule an appointment by selecting an available slot.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the logged-in patient.

    • generateUniqueAppointmentID

      private String generateUniqueAppointmentID()
      Generates a unique appointment ID by checking the maximum existing ID in Appt_List.csv.
      Returns:
      A new unique appointment ID.

    • viewScheduledAppointments

      public void viewScheduledAppointments(String patientID)
      Displays all scheduled appointments for the currently logged-in patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the logged-in patient.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment()
      Allows the patient to cancel one of their scheduled appointments. The canceled slot is added back to the availability list.

    • getAppointmentToReschedule

      public int getAppointmentToReschedule(String patientID)
      Retrieves the slot number of an appointment the patient wishes to reschedule.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the logged-in patient.
      Returns:
      The slot number of the appointment to be rescheduled, or -1 if no appointments are found.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public boolean rescheduleAppointment(String patientID, int selectedSlot)
      Reschedules an appointment for the patient by canceling the selected appointment and adding it back to the availability list.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the logged-in patient.
      selectedSlot - The slot number of the appointment to reschedule.
      Returns:
      true if the appointment was successfully rescheduled, false otherwise.

    • viewPastAppointmentOutcomes

      public void viewPastAppointmentOutcomes(String patientID)
      Displays the outcomes of past appointments for the currently logged-in patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - The ID of the logged-in patient.

    • padColoredString

      private String padColoredString(String str, int width)
      Pads a colored string to a specific width, accounting for ANSI color codes.
      Parameters:
      str - The colored string containing ANSI codes
      width - The desired width of the visible text
      Returns:
      The padded string with proper spacing
